heading: HB03744
0: AN ACT MANDATING LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS TO ALLOCATE FIVE PERCENT (5%) OF THEIR INTERNAL REVENUE ALLOTMENT FOR THE RELOCATION AND RESETTLEMENT OF UNDERPRIVILEGED AND HOMELESS CITIZENS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7279, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE URBAN DEVELOPMENT AND HOUSING ACT OF 1992
